title: Farm Finger FamilyEP155Song for KidsBebefinn Nursery Rhymes

tasks.task: Engage in a finger family farm animal counting and greeting game.
subtasks: Performed repeatedly for multiple animals (cow, dog, sheep, chicken, pig).
Mimic animal sounds (moo, quack, ba-ba, quack, coink).
Yell for each farm finger family member by name (Cow Finger, Dog Finger, etc.).
Wave and ask questions (e.g., "Here I am, here I am, how do you do?").
Sing "hello" and animal sounds (e.g., moo, quack, ba-ba, coink) together.
Occasionally reference a missing finger family member ("My chicken!" "No? Hmm...").
Directly call out the missing animal by name (e.g., "Pig Finger, where are you?").
Perform a signature dance move or action (e.g., "Coink, coink, coink" mimics pig sounds).
End with a shot of the "HIT THE SUBSCRIBE BUTTON" text.
